meanings.definition: A person who oversees or directs a project or activity.
meanings.sent1: The superintendents of the construction site ensured everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The school superintendents are responsible for the district's educational programs.
meanings.sent3: The superintendents of the picnic made sure everyone had enough food and drinks.
meanings.sent4: As the superintendents of the team, they guided their players to victory.
meanings.sent5: The diligent superintendents kept a close eye on the project's progress.

meanings.definition: The act or process of supervising or managing something.
meanings.sent1: Effective superintendents require good organizational skills.
meanings.sent2: The superintendents of the factory oversee production and quality control.
meanings.sent3: The superintendents of the cookie baking contest made sure no cookies went missing.
meanings.sent4: The superintendents of the garden carefully tended to each plant's needs.
meanings.sent5: The superintendents' attention to detail ensured a successful outcome.
